block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Welcome back to our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Today we are making the paper plane 006, the Gliding Butterfly by Makoto Yamaguchi. This model is special because it has forward sweeping wings and it's flight path is a sequence of up and down. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 005 : Astro Tube by Stephen Weiss", please find it at https://youtu.be/A45Bd6ruHVE Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
